alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 09 at 3:01AM CST until February 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. some sleet accumulation also possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Jackson and Cedar Counties. In Illinois, Jo Daviess County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
